name: SHURiKAN SOUNDS - Legends ft. Pianwooo, Cairosharn, KHG Kalm & NinjaTea (Prod. Cairosharn

metadata.name: SHURiKAN SOUNDS - Legends ft. Pianwooo, Cairosharn, KHG Kalm & NinjaTea (Prod. Cairosharn x LEGENDARY LXGZ) 1/75
metadata.description:
SHURiKAN SOUNDS 1st ever Digital Collectable (aka Music NFT). This song 'Legends' was made in November 2022 live in the studio with :

- Korean-British artist Pianwooo
- Jamaican-British Birmingham rapper KHG Kalm 
- Jamaican-British London producer and engineer Cairosharn 
- Indonesian-British Web3 entrepreneur NinjaTea (from Manchester).

The beat was already made before the session previously by Cairosharn & our friend LEGENDARY LXGZ!

SHURiKAN SOUNDS is a Black & Asian owned Web3 music solutions company, Web3 music label and Web3 music community and a subsidiary of Blockchain Sensei 

Pianwooo, KHG Kalm, Cairosharn & NinjaTea are all co-founders of SHURiKAN SOUNDS formed around summer 2022

Other members of the SHURiKAN team are Xavier, DecoMasta & Richard Wheatcroft

This wealth building motivated-themed song is about going hard on your dreams, building legacy & making long-term business moves.

Follow socials:
IG: @SHURiKANSOUNDS.eth
Twitter & TikTok: @SHURiKANSOUNDS

properties.name: SHURiKAN SOUNDS - Legends ft. Pianwooo, Cairosharn, KHG Kalm & NinjaTea (Prod. Cairosharn x LEGENDARY LXGZ)
